basic.description:
An examination of the distributions of plants and animals on global, regional and local scales, their causes and significance.
NOTE    Field trip: estimated cost $25.
LEARNING HOURS    116 (36L;8Oc;72P)
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Advanced Biogeography

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of Level 3 and (GPHY207 or [BIOL201 and BIOL202]), or permission of the Department.
